name: Blue Morning
description:
A short casual platformer. Nothing more, nothing less.

Movement - A and D or arrow keys to move left and right. Space to jump.

Three different game modes:

  • Chill
  • Casual
  • Gamer

Chill - there is only one setback when you die and it is that you will go back to last save station you visited

Casual - Each level you get 8 lives. If you lose all lives, the level only resets, Meaning if you are on level 3, on save point 3, you will lose the save point progress and start level 3 from the beginning, but won't lose the whole game.

Gamer - You have 8 lives. If you die, the game save will be deleted and you have to restart the game.

(The game saves every time you hit a save station(table))
